title: Virtual Machine Monitors VMM
extract: A Virtual Machine Monitor (VMM) is a software program that enables the creation, management and governance of virtual machines (VM) and manages the operation of a virtualized environment on top of a physical host machine. VMM is also known as Virtual Machine Manager and Hypervisor.
extract_html: A Virtual Machine Monitor (VMM) is a software program that enables the creation, management and governance of virtual machines (VM) and manages the operation of a virtualized environment on top of a physical host machine. VMM is also known as Virtual Machine Manager and Hypervisor.
